pacman::p_load(tidyverse, readxl)
weather<- read_csv("data/combined_weather_data.csv")
summary(weather)

Weekly_dengue <-read_xlsx("data/Denguecases.xlsx", "Weekly")

Monthly_dengue <-read_xlsx("data/Denguecases.xlsx", "Monthly")
